description: Normalize wide format data (H01-H24, V01-V24) into a long format (DATETIME, Value, Validation) using a transformation similar to Pandas melt.
Reconcile 'MAGNITUD' (Pollutant ID) column with a custom or external service to link to external pollutant entities (e.g., Wikidata).
Add a static link for 'MUNICIPIO' (Municipality) to the Madrid Wikidata entity (Q2807) based on PROVINCIA=28 and MUNICIPIO=79.
